title: net: Addr interface documentation unclear
body:
The [Addr](https://golang.org/pkg/net/#Addr) Network() method's comment/doc is unclear.

The Network() method [as implemented by IPAddr](https://golang.org/src/net/iprawsock.go?s=357:390#L4) is not the name of a given network, but the name of the protocol of the Addr implementation.

Maybe "Network Name" is the appropriate terminology for this, but it is hard to search. I don't know what it should say but I think more would be helpful.

Edits: ianlancetaylor's correction.
